## Source: ossf-package-analysis (b559f3cd937bf6a83765ea7587dc679e744f33e771aca54caf5c6fbf480ce85f)
The OpenSSF Package Analysis project identified 'dummy-loosesight-gd' @ 1.11.2 (npm) as malicious.

It is considered malicious because:

- The package communicates with a domain associated with malicious activity.

- The package executes one or more commands associated with malicious behavior.
